title.rendered: “Brigade 7’s Tenacious Combat Against Terrorism: A Detailed Account of IDF Operations in Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Combat teams from Brigade 7 detained terrorists who tried to escape under the protection of the population as part of the efforts to evacuate residents from the combat zone; the forces continue their fierce fighting in Khan Yunis’s west, in Zeitoun, and in the center of the Strip.

Combat teams from Brigade 7 continue their fight in the west of Khan Yunis. In the past day, as part of the efforts to evacuate residents from the combat zone, the fighters detained several terrorists who tried to escape under the protection of the population. The fighters also neutralized several terrorists and located weapons in the terrain.

Combat teams of Givati Brigade continued to raid terror targets and located numerous weapons, including sniper rifles, AK-47s, grenades, and ammunition depots.

The Fire complex of Brigade 98 identified a group of terrorists operating a drone. The aircraft attacked and neutralized several terrorists.

In the Strip’s center, the combat team of the Nahal Brigade neutralized several terrorists over the past day.
As part of the ongoing operation by the forces of Brigade 162 in the Zeitoun area, the combat team of the Nahal Brigade located weapons and destroyed launch sites in the terrain.

The forces of the Gaza Division identified a group of terrorists operating a drone in the Shati area, and an Air Force aircraft attacked and neutralized the group.

Over the past day, the Air Force executed several airstrikes in the Strip and struck the airarray of Hamas. Among the attacked targets were several rocket launch sites aimed at firing towards Israel.

Attached is documentation from the attacks on the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3wumemI

Attached is documentation of the destruction of the launch sites by fighters of the Nahal Brigade’s combat team: https://bit.ly/4bMkHsn

Attached are photos of the forces’ activities in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC250220246854165412
